DOC.brief_summary: The study pragmatic , single blind , randomise , control feasibility study , compare 6 month web-based physiotherapy plus usual care usual care alone pwMS . The study recruit 90 pwMS three UK Centres ( 30 centre ) ; NHS Ayrshire Arran , NHS Lothian , Plymouth Hospitals NHS Trust . The aim study assess feasibility randomise control trial examine effectiveness six-month web-based physiotherapy programme usual care compare usual care alone , people moderately affect MS gather essential information plan definitive trial , would evaluate clinical cost effectiveness intervention .
DOC.brief_title: WEB-Based Physiotherapy People With Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: Following baseline assessment , group give appointment physiotherapist agree share goal devise individualise exercise programme base upon need treatment goal . Participants randomise one two group . Participants randomise intervention group receive individualise exercise programme deliver via web-based physio website . Participants ask complete exercise programme least twice weekly . They receive weekly standardise phone call physiotherapist first two week programme . Every two week thereafter remainder 6 month intervention period physiotherapist review exercise diary participant remotely alter participant 's exercise programme appropriate , change combination exercise , level difficulty number repetition . The number type exercise within programme duration complete exercise programme document . Participants inform change standardise email . Participants randomise control group receive print exercise sheet individualise exercise programme . Participants ask complete exercise programme least twice weekly . Compliance capture use home exercise diary . Participants also receive weekly phone call physiotherapist first two week check progress .
DOC.criteria: A confirmed diagnosis MS Known MS consultant NHS Ayrshire Arran , Lothian Plymouth Hospitals NHS Trust EDSS 4 6.5 Access personal computer/tablet smart television email address internet connection Currently take part regular exercise ( two time per week ) and/or regular physiotherapy programme Poor cognitive function assess Mini Mental State Examination Score ( MMSE ) < 24 Any significant change medication ( within last 3 month ) Relapse within 3 month require treatment Other significant comorbidities exercise contraindicate Unwilling randomise intervention/control group Currently participate another clinical trial ( rehabilitation pharmacological )
